mutants.mutated_line: combinations = ['MUTATED'.join(p) for p in itertools.product(characters, repeat=length)]
mutants.code:
import itertools

def generate_combinations(characters, length):
    combinations = ['MUTATED'.join(p) for p in itertools.product(characters, repeat=length)]
    return combinations
